title: 9/10 would have been 10/10 if not for one scene -- Spoilers
review: First of all let me say I am a QT fan, and thought that his Kill Bill films were excellent.But what was with that scene with Budd at the strip club?  Did we really need to say that.  I also would have preferred a longer fight scene at the end with Bill.SPOILERSIMHO The fight scene between Elle and Mamba for me was one of the best fight scenes of the year.Just my two cents...
